events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting relevant experience and skills.
The recruiting team categorised the application under engineering roles specifically tailoring it for the developer vacancy.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles was assigned to follow up with the candidate and coordinate next steps.
The screening call went well; the recruiter confirmed the candidate meets the basic technical requirements for the developer role.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the software engineering position and availability for the next interview.
The technical interview was scheduled for Friday to assess the candidateâ€™s development skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding proficiency and technical knowledge.
An HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture fit and benefits with the candidate following the positive technical evaluation.
The HR interview completed successfully; the candidate showed good alignment with company values and expectations.
A formal job offer was proposed to the candidate including compensation details and employment terms for the engineering role.
The candidate provided positive feedback expressing strong interest in joining the engineering team and accepting the role.
The candidate officially accepted the offer for the software engineer position and agreed on the start date provided.
The onboarding process started smoothly with the candidate completing initial paperwork and attending orientation sessions.
The recruitment for the software engineer role has been closed successfully with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated.
